ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In them are two clear flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With two springs of water flowing through them both. --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In each of the two Gardens are two flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the two gardens there will be two flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In the two Gardens flow two springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In them (both) will be two springs flowing (free).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In both of them are two fountains flowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein two fountains of running water --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In both of them, there are two springs flowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In which, will be two fountains running.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In both of them will be two flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In them (each) will be two Springs flowing (free);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In them (both) will be two springs flowing (free)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In them are two flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:50] In both of them there are two flowing springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 636 (Wherein are two fountains flowing) for the dwellers of Paradise containing goodness, mercy, bestowal of honour, grace and more from Allah.
